Directed by Christopher Miller.

Written by Christopher Miller. Christopher Miller. Christopher Miller. Christopher Miller. Nicole Delaney. Nicole Delaney. Anthony King. Jordan Shipley. Jordan Shipley. Justin Shipley. Justin Shipley. Jack Dolgen. Phil Lord. Kassia Miller. Rachel Smith. Bridger Winegar.

Cast Sam Richardson( Aniq 1) . Zoe Chao( ZoÃ« 1) . Alanna Phillips( Wedding Guest 1) . Ken Jeong( Feng 1) . Paul Walter Hauser( Travis 1) . John Cho( Ulysses 1) . Elizabeth Perkins( Isabel 1) . Anna Konkle( Hannah 1) . Poppy Liu( Grace 1) . Jack Whitehall( Sebastian 1) . Zach Woods( Edgar 1) . Vivian Wu( Vivian 1) . Ike Barinholtz( Brett). Ben Schwartz( Yasper). Ilana Glazer( Chelsea). Jamie Demetriou( Walt). Dave Franco( Xavier). John Early( Detective Culp). Tiya Sircar( Jennifer #1). Kelvin Yu( Ned). Devavani Conroy( Family Member, Wedding Guest). Ayden Mayeri( Jennifer #2). Genevieve Angelson( Indigo). Jade Wu( Aunt Ruth). Everly Carganilla( Maggie). Miracle Laurie( Quiet Heather). Christopher May( Mr. Shapiro). Will Forte( Will Forte). Mel Rodriguez( Captain Ostrander). Danielle Juliet Ma( Classmate #2) . Robert Leh( Servant). Channing Tatum( Channing Tatum). Fred Savage( Vaughn). Reid Scott( Aldrin Germain). Christopher Allen( Officer Matsuno). Haley Tju( Veronica). Kenny Cooper( DJ). Shylo Molina( Young Sebastian). Brady Amaya( Young Edgar). Brandon Keener( Officer #1). Barbie Ferreira( Willow). David Banks( Officer #2). Al Bayan( Classmate #1). Jimmy Tatro( Officer Kleyes). Ashley Dulaney( Classmate #2). Momo Bedier( Baz). Jill Basey( Mrs. Pattendole). Chris Coppola( Mickey). Andrew Flory( Teen Partygoer #1). Kelen Coleman( Tatiana). Cree Kawa( Teen Partygoer #2). Azia Celestino( Linda Dela Rosa). Corey Reynolds( Danner’s Dad). Emma Katherine Kennedy( Teen Partygoer #3). Eddie Alfano( Sergeant Dale). Cale Schultz( Bouncer Bob). Owen Szabo( Caterer). Anthony M. Bertram( Chief). Malcolm Bowen( Crew Cut Cadet). Austin Boyce( Sam). Chris Wolfe( Too-Chipper Anchor). Calico Cooper( 2nd A.D.). Michael Caponera( Bong Dude). Makenzie Lee-Foster( 8-Year-Old Danner). Austin Fryberger( Officer). Jim Hanna( Captain Albanese). Jamison Jones( Marshall). Brian Kamei( Gangbanger). Kimleigh Smith( Danner’s Mom). Susan Song( C.S.I. Tricia). Abhi Trivedi( Randall). John Gemberling( Jaxon). Remy Holt( Young Grace). Will Greenberg( Judson). Paul Archer( Soldier). Krishna Smitha( Officer). Danielle Lima( Skater). Arya Feldman( Young Zoe). Monica Azcarate( Juliett). Ellie Grace Pomeroy( Young Hannah). Jude Wells( Detective). AnaÃ¯s Blake( Irish Dancer #1). Joya Kazi( Indian Dancer #2). Jonney Ahmanson( Karaoke Dj). Mark Green( Maasai Warrior). Ethan Bell( Young Jaxson). Danielle Fraboni LaRauf( Irish Dancer #3). KJ Alfrey( Wedding Guest(uncredited) 1) . Aaron Kelly( Wedding Guest (uncredited) 1) . Brittney Baxter( Bachelorette(uncredited)). Franklin McCay( Man at Park(uncredited)). Nick Drago( Dancer (uncredited)). Artie Esposito( Puppeteer (uncredited)). Rachel Herrick( Ned Puppeteer (uncredited)). Charles Fournier( Dancer #3 (uncredited)). Jada Megan Symes( Server (uncredited)). Gary Nguyen( Wedding Guest (uncredited)). Peter Lawrence Singer( Irish Pub Patron (uncredited))

Language English.

Producers Michael Cedar. Anthony King. Phil Lord. Christopher Miller. Michael L. Holland. Jordan Shipley. Justin Shipley. Tina Tholke. Aubrey Davis Lee. Joel Negron. Bridger Winegar. Kassia Miller. Annie Court.

Production Columbia TriStar TV Productions. Lord Miller. Sony Pictures Television.

 

Number of Seasons 2

Number of Episodes 18

Status OnGoing (2022–)
